The word of the living God is to be our lesson-book. Here, in both the Old and New Testaments, is a statement of the mistakes made by ancient Israel. Shall we, as did they, fail to improve the most precious opportunities for doing the work of God? If, during the three years past, the opportunities had been truly 


                                -313- 

improved to meet the requirements of this time, some who are now lost to the cause of God, would stand ready to serve as genuine missionaries.
